about_the_game:
"Rise Achlys" delves into a dark and dramatic narrative, exploring themes of tragedy, sacrifice, and the relentless pursuit of vengeance. At its core, it's a story of a young half-vampire named Achlys, raised by his foster family, only to witness their gruesome murder.

Fueled by a desire for revenge and the longing to resurrect his loved ones, Achlys embarks on a harrowing journey to find his true father, the enigmatic Dracula. Achlys will lose everything he holds dear along this treacherous path, ultimately evolving into a character of profound strength and maturity.





Embark on a Time-Traveling Adventure: Join Achlys, the son of Dracula, with the assistance of Dr. Frankenstein, as you journey through different eras and environments. Traverse the past and future, and carve your path into endless possibilities.



Play to the Beat: Engage the rhythm mechanic to perform attacks in perfect sync, replenishing your stamina and allowing you to unleash limitless, unstoppable combos. When activated, your stamina continuously drains, adding a thrilling challenge. Mastering this mechanic rewards your focus and precision, making every battle an exhilarating test of skill!

Master Fire, Shadow, and Blood: Achlys boasts an extensive skill tree, offering diverse abilities across these powerful subtypes. You can choose to specialize in one, or master all three! Customize your abilities and create your unique character build. Shape your vampire persona and play style to your liking, becoming the ultimate vampire warrior!



Transform into Three Animals: As the son of Dracula, Achlys possesses the ability to transform into a wolf, rat, or bat, mirroring the powers described in Bram Stoker's original Dracula novel. Each form offers unique skills and advantages.

As a bat, Achlys soars through the air, gracefully dodging enemy attacks until his stamina wanes. In wolf form, he becomes a whirlwind of speed and ferocity, unleashing devastating assaults. Transforming into a rat, he slips through narrow passages like pipes, uncovering secret pathways hidden from sight.



Discover Non-linear Levels: Navigate the unique, expansive universe of Rise Achlys, venturing through diverse time periods and locations. Engage with intricate level designs featuring a variety of platforms, from moving and crumbling platforms to those that react to your actions. Overcome dynamic obstacles and uncover hidden paths as you interact with every element in the environment. Travel through time and master each meticulously crafted level, forging your own path to the finish!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Rise Achlys is a brutal gothic soulsvania and rogue-lite inspired by Castlevania. The story-driven game features a vampire protagonist and iconic characters like Dracula and Frankenstein, with time travel and fantasy themes. It also integrates unique music mechanics into the gameplay.
